name: Long live the Queen (itch) (Emurga)
description:
You play as an ant Queen, too busy laying eggs to even think of moving but you can select which kind of ants is the more needed for the survival of the hive.

There are three kind of ants :

Workers : They take care of the eggs, without them, no more viable eggs,

Fighter : Those are you warriors, they defend the hive from intrusion,

Explorer : Those are the ants charged with bringing food to the hive, but doing so they also raise the awareness of the predators living near the hive.
